application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Reduce the height of 7 x London Planes (T1 - T7) to 16m.  The existing height of these trees are between 18-20m.My Client MBNL, a joint venture between EE and Three, are responsible for providing the infrastructure for the new Emergency Services Network and will beutilising their existing sites in order to build this Network. Details of their commitment to this project can be found at the following link:https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/the-emergency-services-mobile-communications-programme/emergency-services-network#ee-coverage. MBNLtechnicians have identified that these trees are causing an obstruction to their equipment and thereby affecting the coverage within the local area. Theproposed reduction to these trees will restore full coverage to the network and ensure an efficient switch over from the current supplier of the EmergencyServices Network (Airwave) to EE.
